name: homarr
description: Homarr is a modern self hosted dashboard and homepage that aggregates links, widgets and service status in a grid layout. It includes app detection, search, theming and drag and drop customization for homelab users.
features: Grid Layout: Organize services and widgets in a flexible, responsive grid system.
Drag-and-Drop: Customize dashboard layout by dragging tiles to desired positions.
Service Integration: Connect to popular self-hosted apps with automatic status detection.
Widget System: Add weather, calendar, RSS feeds, and system stats to your dashboard.
Search Functionality: Quickly find and launch services with integrated search.
Theme Customization: Choose from multiple themes or create custom color schemes.
Multi-User: Create separate dashboards for different users with individual preferences.
App Detection: Automatically discover and configure services running on your network.
